item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description:
From my reading of the article, it'll be forced on game servers, not clients.
I wonder if there will be longer term effects on game design rising from this. Lose the Chinese market, or design for a three hour playing session... shouldn't be a tough call for MMO producers.
item.content:encoded:
From my reading of the article, it’ll be forced on game servers, not clients.

I wonder if there will be longer term effects on game design rising from this. Lose the Chinese market, or design for a three hour playing session… shouldn’t be a tough call for MMO producers.
